products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Trinity (blackout), shadow - roller blind when you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems,
products.productdescription: When you think of a shadow you think of the absence of light, but what if you could turn conventional wisdom on its head? Trinity blackout shadow welcomes you into a world in which nothing is quite what it seems, and your dark fabric is actually a natural charcoal that brings any space to life.We love the idea of pairing shadow with light lively natural shades to provide some natural balance and contrast. Light woods and hessian canvases would be a couple of ideas you might think about exploring a little further.

products.title: Kindling, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Kindling, shadow - roller blind as you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and wi
products.productdescription: As you look at kindling shadow you come to wonder about what it means. Is this a free-flowing modernist pattern? Or is it a homage to the floral prints that we all know and love? It can be whatever you want it to be, and with a refined combination of regal colour on show it can add anything you want to your decor too.The silver makes the perfect companion to coppers and golds. Use them as the finishing touches rather than the primary colours so that you don't overwhelm your interior. Perfect for that luxurious look and feel.

products.title: Garden City, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Garden city, shadow - roller blind garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on
products.productdescription: Garden city shadow adds that urban and contemporary chic feeling to any space your heart desires, and it does so with a striking visual you won't find anywhere else. The signature of the range is that the stripes take on a life of their own, unconstrained by thick outlines or crisp edges. When you want to create a theme that instantly sets your mind at ease there's no better way to do it than to embrace other urban finishes. Chrome fixtures in the ensuite and plenty of crisp whites and dark greys are all you need to create a minimalist masterpiece.

products.title: Visage, Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Visage, shadow - roller blind visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you ne
products.productdescription: Visage shadow is an inspired combination of light and breezy fabric and industrial colouring. The variation in widths is what gives the stripes a life of their own and allows you to get lost in the moment. Exactly what you need when you want to create a space you never want to leave.Allow yourself to be inspired, and add plenty of matching light woody beiges to the mixing pot. This is their advice to you if you want to be able to reframe your living room and bedroom. It's all about embracing simple colours and homely textures, so give some thought to your options.

products.title: Africa (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Africa (blackout), shadow - roller blind there's nothing more awe-inspiring than standing back and immersing yourself in the intricacy of the tribal stylings of their new africa blackout shadow fabric. It gives any space your heart desires an added layer of
products.productdescription: There's nothing more awe-inspiring than standing back and immersing yourself in the intricacy of the tribal stylings of their new africa blackout shadow fabric. It gives any space your heart desires an added layer of depth and clarity, and it even has the splash of colour that can be so hard to integrate. Match shadow to some tribal themed wall art and you'll be able to turn the master bedroom into the homely and inspiring space that you love to relax in at the end of a long day. Perfect for getting ready for the adventures that lie just around the corner.
